summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a road with moderate traffic. A white sedan is ahead, maintaining a consistent speed. A silver car on the right side is gradually overtaking the self-driving vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed and lane position. The driver is likely monitoring the surrounding traffic, especially the silver car on the right side that is overtaking.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, maintaining a consistent speed. 2) Right: A silver car, approximately 5 meters away, gradually overtaking the self-driving vehicle.
